subtests.name: Calling send() when data channel is in connecting state should throw InvalidStateError
Datachannel should be able to send simple string and receive as string
Datachannel should be able to send unicode string and receive as unicode string
Datachannel should ignore binaryType and always receive string message as string
Datachannel should be able to send an empty string and receive an empty string
Datachannel should be able to send Uint8Array message and receive as ArrayBuffer
Datachannel should be able to send ArrayBuffer message and receive as ArrayBuffer
Datachannel should be able to send an empty ArrayBuffer message and receive as ArrayBuffer
Datachannel should be able to send Blob message and receive as ArrayBuffer
Datachannel should be able to send ArrayBuffer message and receive as Blob
Datachannel binaryType should receive message as Blob by default
Datachannel sending multiple messages with different types should succeed and be received
Datachannel send() up to max size should succeed, above max size should fail
Negotiated datachannel should be able to send simple string and receive as string
Negotiated datachannel should be able to send unicode string and receive as unicode string
Negotiated datachannel should ignore binaryType and always receive string message as string
Negotiated datachannel should be able to send an empty string and receive an empty string
Negotiated datachannel should be able to send Uint8Array message and receive as ArrayBuffer
Negotiated datachannel should be able to send ArrayBuffer message and receive as ArrayBuffer
Negotiated datachannel should be able to send an empty ArrayBuffer message and receive as ArrayBuffer
Negotiated datachannel should be able to send Blob message and receive as ArrayBuffer
Negotiated datachannel should be able to send ArrayBuffer message and receive as Blob
Negotiated datachannel binaryType should receive message as Blob by default
Negotiated datachannel sending multiple messages with different types should succeed and be received
Negotiated datachannel send() up to max size should succeed, above max size should fail
